name: Destroy The Monoliths [pre-alpha]
description:
Radiant Sloth is a solo indie game developer from France. His debut game Skycliffs (action shooter dungeon-crawler roguelike) was released on Steam in Early Access in 2022. Meanwhile, he has started working on his second project, Destroy The Monoliths, thus continuing his exploration of the action roguelike genre.

To follow updates and devlogs, check out his blog: www.radiantsloth.com
